quote: Only 10% programming is coding.Other 90% is debugging.
There is nothing quite so permanent as a quick fix.
Experience is the name everyone gives to their mistakes.
Computers do not solve problems, they execute solutions.
One man’s constant is another man’s variable.
Code never lies, comments sometimes do.

projects.name: Indigo (Hotel)
projects.description: Led the development of a comprehensive hotel booking platform aimed at providing travelers with a seamless and user-friendly interface for hotel booking experience. Ensured adherence to best practices and coding standards to maintain code quality.

projects.name: Sbi Cards (Flights)
projects.description: Developed an intuitive flight search interface that allows users to search for flights based on destination, dates, preferred airlines.Implemented real-time availability checks and reservation functionalities to enable users to book flights seamlessly.

projects.name: Workfitt
projects.description: Designed and executed a full-stack freelance project, delivering a user-friendly platform to streamline healthcare processes and enhance patient monitoring. Key features include personalized prescription generation, automated audio exercise tracking, doctor login, admin panel for component management, and API integration for seamless communication between front-end and back-end systems.

projects.name: Tata Neu (Hotels)
projects.description: Designed and implemented the backend architecture and services, including APIs,databases, and business logic components, to support the functionality and requirements of the hotel booking platform.Collaborated with cross-functional teams to deliver new features and enhancements to the platform

projects.name: Vms Component Library
projects.description: Developed a component library, organizing components into categories such as buttons, forms, cards, and modals.Implemented a scalable and extensible structure to accommodate future expansion and customization.The component library serves as a centralized repository of UI elements, facilitating efficiency in front-end development.
